hospitals.name: UP Health System
hospitals.info: UP Health System - Portage is a full-service hospital with 36 inpatient beds and a wide range of services, including emergency care, surgery, imaging, and rehabilitation.

hospitals.name: Aspirus Keweenaw Hospital
hospitals.info: Aspirus Keweenaw Hospital is a critical access hospital with 25 beds and a Level III trauma center designation. The hospital provides a wide range of services, including emergency care, surgery, imaging, and rehabilitation.

hospitals.name: Baraga County Memorial Hospital
hospitals.info: Baraga County Memorial Hospital is a critical access hospital with 15 beds and a Level IV trauma center designation. The hospital provides a range of services, including emergency care, surgery, and imaging.

hospitals.name: Iron County Community Hospital
hospitals.info: Iron County Community Hospital is a critical access hospital with 14 beds and a Level IV trauma center designation. The hospital provides a range of services, including emergency care, surgery, and imaging.

hospitals.name: Dickinson County Healthcare System
hospitals.info: Dickinson County Healthcare System is a full-service hospital with 49 inpatient beds and a Level III trauma center designation. The hospital provides a wide range of services, including emergency care, surgery, imaging, and rehabilitation.
